name: Keep It Alive - Ludum Dare 46 (Bearly Functional Games)
name_original: Keep It Alive - Ludum Dare 46 (Bearly Functional Games)
description:
Submission for Ludum Dare 46 - theme was "Keep It Alive"...which I took quite literally.

Instructions:

Click to throw candy and attract the citizens of Derry, Maine towards the sewer grates so that IT can feed!  Be careful you don't let anyone escape - they've seen something strange and will report it to the police!  Once the street light has been fully lit, you'll be exposed and cease to exist.
